sentence.Network_en: Although it's not strenuous exercise, you feel toned-up, supple and relaxed.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然这不是剧烈运动，但会让人感到强健、柔韧与放松。

sentence.Network_en: This mask leaves your complexion feeling soft and supple.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种面膜能使你的皮肤变得柔软细嫩。

sentence.Network_en: Traditional cheesemaking skills give our brie its soft, supple, creamy texture.
sentence.Network_cn: 用传统干酪制作技术制成的布里干酪柔软，不易裂开，而且口感细滑。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French souple, from Latin supplex, supplic- 'submissive', from sub- 'under' + placere 'propitiate'

entry.tran: (物体、材料)易弯曲的，柔软的，柔韧的
entry.def: A supple object or material bends or changes shape easily without cracking or breaking.

example.ex: The leather is supple and sturdy enough to last for years...
example.tran: 该皮革柔软而结实，足以用上数年。

example.ex: Traditional cheesemaking skills give our brie its soft, supple, creamy texture.
example.tran: 用传统干酪制作技术制成的布里干酪柔软，不易裂开，而且口感细滑。

entry.def: A supple person can move and bend their body very easily.

example.ex: Paul was incredibly supple and strong...
example.tran: 保罗身体极其灵活，而且非常结实。

example.ex: Try these simple exercises to keep your feet supple.
example.tran: 尝试做这些简单的锻炼来保持双脚的柔韧性。

entry.def: If you describe something such as a flavour or a sound as supple, you like it because it is smooth and rich.

example.ex: The wine has a medium-bodied, supple flavour.
example.tran: 该葡萄酒味道不浓不淡，口感醇滑。

example.ex: ...the haunting didgeridoo, the teasing keyboards and the supple bassline.
example.tran: 萦绕心头的迪吉里杜管奏出的曲调，戏谑挑逗的电子键盘声和低沉悦耳的贝司音乐

sentences.sentence: "These boots are not yet suppled by frequent use"

means.word_mean: 1. gracefully slender; moving and bending with ease
2. (used of e.g. personality traits) readily adaptable;
3. (used of persons' bodies) capable of moving or bending freely

auth_sentence.content: Their subtle dynamic shading keeps the music mobile and supple.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their subtle dynamic shading keeps the music mobile and supple.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their subtle dynamic shading keeps the music mobile and supple.

auth_sentence.content: Willow sticks...did not become brittle but remained supple.
auth_sentence.res_content: Willow sticks...did not become brittle but remained supple.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Willow sticks...did not become brittle but remained supple.

auth_sentence.content: Supple is only one word for the director's technique.
auth_sentence.res_content: Supple is only one word for the director's technique.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Supple is only one word for the director's technique.

sentences.en: exercises that will help you to keep supple
sentences.cn: 有助于保持身体柔韧的锻炼

sentences.en: leaving your skin feeling soft and supple
sentences.cn: 让皮肤感觉柔软有弹性

sentences.en: a cream that is used on dry skins to make them nice and supple
sentences.cn: 能使干性皮肤细腻有弹性的护肤霜

sentences.en: He was gradually getting more supple.
sentences.cn: 他的身体逐渐可以活动自如。

sentences.en: Her skin had stayed soft and supple.
sentences.cn: 她的皮肤一直柔滑而有弹性。
